    • Uses of NonNullableTransientDependencies in org.hibernate.engine.internal

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NonNullableTransientDependencies ForeignKeys.findNonNullableTransientEntities(String entityName, Object entity, Object[] values, boolean isEarlyInsert, SessionImplementor session)
      Find all non-nullable references to entities that have not yet been inserted in the database, where the foreign key is a reference to an unsaved transient entity.
